channel.title: Jira
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [KBA-5105] [API][BP] International Wire withdrawal for Tenant's Client CA with keyrails+partner fees
item.description:
Preconditions:

  1. Create Client on Admin Dashboard
  2. Onboard client to t*he appropriate Banking Partner*
  3. International Wire is enabled for Tenant (Admin Dashboard-> Tenant details-> three dots menu)
  4. Login to Public API as Client
  5. Create Account for Tenant’s Client (https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-617 )
  6. Create Wire EA for Client (https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-627 )
  7. Top up Account balance (example: Wire Deposit simulation)
  8. Set up Pricing (e.g. fixed - 5 usd, bps -50, partner fixed fee - 5, partner bps fee - 50) or choose existing one
  9. Assign pricing for tenant https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-2908
  10. Configure webhooks https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-513

Note: account’s available balance >= transaction amount + pricing

Note:

Case_1
Check that bps pricing = 0

Case_2
Check that fixed pricing = 0

NOTE: Try for all possible Banking Partners

  • Withdrawal payments remain in processing status and the payment amount is not changed if EA is NOT approved
  • Withdrawal payments remain in processing status and the payment amount is moved to locked if EA is approved
  • PartnerFee will always $10 if EA is approved
item.summary: [API][BP] International Wire withdrawal for Tenant's Client CA with keyrails+partner fees

item.title: [KBA-5093] [API][Negative] Wire withdrawal when partner fee equals or exceeds payment amount
item.description:
Preconditions:

  1. Create Client on Admin Dashboard
  2. Onboard client to the appropriate Banking Partner
  3. Login to Public API as Client
  4. Create Account for Tenant L1/L2 (https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-616 )
  5. Create Wire EA (https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-597 )
  6. Top up Account balance (example: Wire Deposit simulation)
  7. Set up Pricing (e.g. fixed partner fee - 10 usd, bps - 0) or choose existing one
  8. Assign pricing for tenant https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-2908
  • PartnerFee will always $10 if EA is approved

TESTING NOTE: Test Domestic/International wire withdrawals for Tenant and Tenant’s client
item.summary: [API][Negative] Wire withdrawal when partner fee equals or exceeds payment amount

item.title: [KBA-5068] [API][BP] International Wire withdrawal for Tenant CA with partner fee
item.description:
Preconditions:

  1. Create Client on Admin Dashboard
  2. Onboard client to the appropriate Banking Partner
  3. International Wire is enabled for Tenant (Admin Dashboard-> Tenant details-> three dots menu)
  4. Login to Public API as Client
  5. Create Account for Tenant (https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-616 )
  6. Create International Wire EA (https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-598 )
  7. Top up Account balance (example: Wire Deposit simulation)
  8. Configure Partner fee (fixed partner - 10, partner bps-50)
  9. Assign pricing for tenant https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-2908
  10. Configure webhooks https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-513
  11. Remember Tenant and Keyrails account balances

Note: Check also 2 cases:

  • Case_1: Check that bps pricing = 0
  • Case_2: Check that fixed pricing = 0

NOTE: Try for all possible Banking Partners

  • Withdrawal payments remain in processing status and the payment amount is not changed if EA is NOT approved
  • Withdrawal payments remain in processing status and the payment amount is moved to locked if EA is approved
  • PartnerFee will always $10 if EA is approved
item.summary: [API][BP] International Wire withdrawal for Tenant CA with partner fee

item.title: [KBA-5066] [API][BP] Wire withdrawal for Tenant's Client CA with applied+partner fees
item.description:
Preconditions:

  1. Create Client on Admin Dashboard
  2. Onboard client to t*he appropriate Banking Partner*
  3. Login to Public API as Client
  4. Create Account for Tenant’s Client (https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-617 )
  5. Create Wire EA for Client ( https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-626 )
  6. Top up Account balance (example: Wire Deposit simulation)
  7. Configure pricing (set e.g. partner fixed fee - 10, partner bps fee -50)
  8. Configure webhooks https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-513
  9. Save balances of tenant`s and client`s account

NOTE: Try for all possible Banking Partners

  • Withdrawal payments remain in processing status and the payment amount is not changed if EA is NOT approved
  • Withdrawal payments remain in processing status and the payment amount is moved to locked if EA is approved
  • PartnerFee will always $10 if EA is approved

item.title: [KBA-5062] [UI][Admin] Transaction details - Withdrawal Wire International for Tenant - with linked pricing(keyrails+partner fees)
item.description:
Execute payment for the appropriate case and check UI part of the appropriate transaction.

  • CASE 1: Admin Dashboard → Transactions → Transaction Details
  • CASE 2: Admin Dashboard → Clients → Client Details → 'Transaction history' tab → Transaction Details
  • CASE 3: Admin Dashboard → Clients → Client Details → 'Sub-clients' tab → Sub-client details → 'Transaction history' tab → Transaction Details

NOTE: Pricing with positive values is assigned to the Tenant
Test Cases to execute the payment:

https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-691
item.summary: [UI][Admin] Transaction details - Withdrawal Wire International for Tenant - with linked pricing(keyrails+partner fees)

item.title: [KBA-5061] [UI][Admin] Transaction details - Wire Withdrawal for Tenant - with linked pricing(keyrails+partner fees)
item.description:
Execute payment for the appropriate case and check UI part of the appropriate transaction.

  • CASE 1: Admin Dashboard → Transactions → Transaction Details
  • CASE 2: Admin Dashboard → Clients → Client Details → 'Transaction history' tab → Transaction Details

NOTE: Pricing with positive values is assigned to the Tenant - Keyrails and Partner fixed and BPS fees
Test Cases to execute the payment:

https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-690
item.summary: [UI][Admin] Transaction details - Wire Withdrawal for Tenant - with linked pricing(keyrails+partner fees)

item.title: [KBA-4761] [API] Estimate quote of International Wire Withdrawal payment of Tenant's client
item.description:
Preconditions:

  1. Login to Public API as Client
  2. Create Client with L1/L2
  3. Create Account for Tenant’s Client
  4. Create International Wire EA (https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-627 )
  5. Set up Pricing (e.g. fixed - 5 usd, bps -50) https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-2820 or choose existing one
  6. Assign pricing for tenant https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-2908
  7. Configure webhooks https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-513

Note: Try for cases

  • Case 1: fixed pricing = 0 AND bps pricing = !0 AND partner fixed fee = 0 AND partner bps = 0
  • Case 2: fixed pricing != 0 AND bps pricing = 0 AND partner fixed fee = 0 AND partner bps = 0
  • Case 3: fixed pricing != 0 AND bps pricing != 0 AND partner fixed fee = 0 AND partner bps = 0
  • Case 4: fixed pricing = 0 AND bps pricing = 0 AND partner fixed fee = 0 AND partner bps = 0
  • Case 5: fixed pricing = 0 AND bps pricing = 0 AND partner fixed fee != 0 AND partner bps = 0
  • Case 6: fixed pricing = 0 AND bps pricing = 0 AND partner fixed fee = 0 AND partner bps != 0
  • Case 7: fixed pricing = 0 AND bps pricing = 0 AND partner fixed fee != 0 AND partner bps != 0
  • Case 8: fixed pricing != 0 AND bps pricing = 0 AND partner fixed fee != 0 AND partner bps = 0
  • Case 9: fixed pricing = 0 AND bps pricing != 0 AND partner fee != 0 AND partner bps = 0
  • Case 10: fixed pricing != 0 AND bps pricing != 0 AND partner fee != 0 AND partner bps != 0

For regression you can select few cases of the combination, no need to test all of them
item.summary: [API] Estimate quote of International Wire Withdrawal payment of Tenant's client

item.title: [KBA-3543] [API][BP] Buy crypto for client`s CA with keyrails + applied fee
item.description:
Preconditions:

  1. Create Client (Tenant) with L1 or L2 KYB level
  2. Onboard client to the appropriate Banking Partner
  3. Create sub-client for tenant
  4. Authorize to public API
  5. Create Account for sub-client (Tenant) https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-617
  6. Get deposit instructions for sub-account *GET/api/v1/accounts/ {id}/deposit-instruction* and top up it via wire deposit *POST/api/v1/accounts/{id}

    /sandbox/start-incoming-wire*

  7. Set up Pricing (e.g. fixed - 5 usd, bps -50 + partner fee) https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-2820 or choose existing one
  8. Assign pricing for tenant https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-2908
  9. Set up webhook (e.g. type “Payments”, “Transactions”)
  10. Save balances of tenant`s and client`s account

List of supported assets: https://keyrails.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KeyRails/pages/17302904/Supported+Assets+of+KeyRails (different assets are supported for different banking partners)

NOTE: Try for all possible Banking Partners

Webhooks are received when trade with 'Disbursable' balance
Webhooks are NOT received when trade with 'PendingFromTrade' balance

If payment amount <= 'PendingFromTrade' balance, it will take it as a 1st priority
item.summary: [API][BP] Buy crypto for client`s CA with keyrails + applied fee

item.title: [KBA-3276] [API] Estimate quote of Sell Crypto for Tenant's client
item.description:
Preconditions:

  1. Create Client (Tenant)
  2. Upgrade it to L1 or L2
  3. Authorize to public API
  4. Create Client with L1/L2
  5. Create Account for Tenant’s Client
  6. Buy crypto for tenant https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-1603
  7. Set up Pricing (e.g. fixed - 5 usd, bps -50) https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-2820 or choose existing one
  8. Assign pricing for tenanthttps://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-2908
  9. Set up webhook (e.g. type “Payments”, “Transactions”)

List of supported assets: https://keyrails.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KeyRails/pages/17302904/Supported+Assets+of+KeyRails

Note: for sell crypto - fee will be calculated in crypto currency

Note: Try for cases

  • Case 1: fixed pricing = 0 AND bps pricing = 0 AND Partner BPS Fee =0
  • Case 2: fixed pricing != 0 AND bps pricing != 0 AND Partner BPS Fee !=0
  • Case 3: fixed pricing = 0 AND bps pricing != 0 AND Partner BPS Fee !=0
  • Case 4: fixed pricing != 0 AND bps pricing = 0 AND Partner BPS Fee !=0
  • Case 5: fixed pricing != 0 AND bps pricing != 0 AND Partner BPS Fee =0
  • Case 6: fixed pricing = 0 AND bps pricing = 0 AND Partner BPS Fee !=0
  • Case 7: fixed pricing != 0 AND bps pricing = 0 AND Partner BPS Fee =0
  • Case 8: fixed pricing = 0 AND bps pricing != 0 AND Partner BPS Fee =0

For regression you can select few cases of the combination, no need to test all of them
item.summary: [API] Estimate quote of Sell Crypto for Tenant's client

item.title: [KBA-1608] [API][BP] Buy crypto for client`s CA
item.description:
Preconditions:

  1. Create Client (Tenant) with non-CA ‘Country of incorporation’
  2. Onboard client to the appropriate Banking Partner
  3. Create sub-client for tenant
  4. Authorize to public API
  5. Create Account for sub-client https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-617
  6. Get deposit instructions for sub-account *GET/api/v1/accounts/ {id}/deposit-instruction* and top up it via wire deposit *POST/api/v1/accounts/{id}

    /sandbox/start-incoming-wire*

  7. Set up Pricing (e.g. fixed - 5 usd, bps -50 + partner fee) https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-2820 or choose existing one
    Note: Check this flow also with fixed/bps pricing = 0
  8. Assign pricing for tenant https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-2908
  9. Set up webhook (e.g. type “Payments”, “Transactions”)

List of supported assets: https://keyrails.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KeyRails/pages/17302904/Supported+Assets+of+KeyRails (different assets are supported for different banking partners)

NOTE: Try for all possible Banking Partners

Webhooks are received when trade with 'Disbursable' balance
Webhooks are NOT received when trade with 'PendingFromTrade' balance

If payment amount <= 'PendingFromTrade' balance, it will take it as a 1st priority
item.summary: [API][BP] Buy crypto for client`s CA

item.title: [KBA-1603] [API][BP] Buy crypto for tenant CA
item.description:
Preconditions:

  1. Create Client (Tenant) with non-CA country
  2. Onboard client to the appropriate Banking Partner
  3. Authorize to public API
  4. Create account for tenant https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-616
  5. Get deposit instructions for account *GET/api/v1/accounts/ {id}/deposit-instruction* and top up it via wire deposit *POST/api/v1/accounts/{id}

    /sandbox/start-incoming-wire*

  6. Set up Pricing (e.g. fixed - 5 usd, bps -50 + partner fee) https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-2820 or choose existing one
    Note: Check this flow also with fixed/bps pricing = 0
  7. Assign pricing for tenant https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-2908
  8. Set up webhook (e.g. type “Payments”, “Transactions”)

List of supported assets: https://keyrails.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/KeyRails/pages/17302904/Supported+Assets+of+KeyRails (different assets are supported for different banking partners)

NOTE: Try for all possible Banking Partners

Webhooks are received when trade with 'Disbursable' balance
Webhooks are NOT received when trade with 'PendingFromTrade' balance

If payment amount <= 'PendingFromTrade' balance, it will take it as a 1st priority
item.summary: [API][BP] Buy crypto for tenant CA

item.title: [KBA-691] [API][BP] International Wire withdrawal for Tenant CA
item.description:
Preconditions:

  1. Create Client on Admin Dashboard
  2. Onboard client to the appropriate Banking Partner
  3. International Wire is enabled for Tenant (Admin Dashboard-> Tenant details-> three dots menu)
  4. Login to Public API as Client
  5. Create Account for Tenant (https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-616 )
  6. Create International Wire EA (https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-598 )
  7. Top up Account balance (example: Wire Deposit simulation)
  8. Set up Pricing (e.g. fixed - 5 usd, bps -50, partner fixed -10, partner bps - 50) or choose existing one
  9. Assign pricing for tenant https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-2908
  10. Configure webhooks https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-513
  11. Remember Tenant and Keyrails account balances

Note: Check also the following cases:

  • Case_1: Check that bps pricing = 0
  • Case_2: Check that fixed pricing = 0
  • Case_3: Check that bps partner fee = 0
  • Case_4: Check that fixed partner fee = 0

NOTE: Try for all possible Banking Partners
item.summary: [API][BP] International Wire withdrawal for Tenant CA

item.title: [KBA-690] [API][BP] Wire withdrawal for Tenant CA
item.description:
Preconditions:

  1. Create Client on Admin Dashboard
  2. Onboard client to the appropriate Banking Partner
  3. Login to Public API as Client
  4. Create Account for Tenant L1/L2 (https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-616 )
  5. Create Wire EA (https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-597 )
  6. Top up Account balance (example: Wire Deposit simulation)
  7. Set up Pricing (e.g. fixed - 5 usd, bps -50, partner fixed -10, partner bps - 50) or choose existing one
  8. Assign pricing for tenant https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-2908
  9. Configure webhooks https://keyrails.atlassian.net/browse/KBA-513

Note: Check also 2 cases:

  • Case_1: Check that bps pricing = 0
  • Case_2: Check that fixed pricing = 0
  • Case_3: Check that bps partner fee = 0
  • Case_4: Check that fixed partner fee = 0

NOTE: Try for all possible Banking Partners
item.summary: [API][BP] Wire withdrawal for Tenant CA
